data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: You might be winning but you’re not growing, and growing might be the most important form of winning.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Watch people like a hawk, and when they do something good, tell them.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: No learning environment is safe, by the way. I don’t know about you, but every important thing in my life I’ve ever learned was painful.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: If you dare to do the most difficult thing you can conceptualize your life will work out better than if you do anything else.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Make friends with people who want the best for you.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: A harmless man is not a good man. A good man is a very dangerous man who has that under voluntary control.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Maintain your connections with people in your life.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Treat yourself as if you were someone that you are responsible for helping.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Do not try to rescue someone who does not want to be rescued, and be very careful about rescuing someone who does.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Dress like the person you want to be.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Be precise in your speech.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Don’t avoid something frightening if it stands in your way.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Do not hide unwanted things in the fog.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Read something written by someone great.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Don’t let bullies get away with it.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: You cannot aim yourself at anything if you are completely undisciplined and untutored.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Remember that what you do not know is more important than what you already know.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Anything that you let win grows. Don’t practice what you don’t want to become

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: If you cannot bring peace to your household, how dare you try to rule a city.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Sometimes, when things are not going well, it’s not the world that’s the cause.
